trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around October 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying on the beach facing toward the town on a sand hill, talking on the phone when I'm looking at the sky and a, probably, USO, just came from the direction of the ocean and went on a straight trajectory east. It was silent, had 3 red glowing circles at the points of the triangle. I was startled and told the person I was talking with what I was seeing instead of taking a picture. It silently continued on a straight path until it disappeared far above the horizon. It was beast.
Summary: Had to have been huge because how far up from the horizon it was when it dissapeared into the sight-line trajectory, no noise whatsoever tho
